Caption.comment: This is caption text, regular weight. It is used as captions and timestamps ex: 7 minutes ago.

CaptionMedium.comment: This is caption text, medium weight. This style is used in Badges and links

CaptionMediumCaps.comment: This is caption text, medium weight in caps. This style is used in Card Eyebrow

CaptionBold.comment: This is caption text, medium weight. This style is used in Badges and links

CaptionBoldCaps.comment: This is caption text, medium weight. This style is used in Badges and links

Body.comment: This is Body 1, in regular weight. It is a primary size for copy in a side panel, atoms and molecule components such as chips, selections. text in modal and  lists ...

BodyMedium.comment: This is Body 1 in medium weight, which is predominately used in Accordion header, and links

BodyBold.comment: This is Body 1 in bold weight. Used as a Section title in the side panel, Modular accordion header paired with icon, selections

BodyBoldCaps.comment: This is Body 1 in bold weight. Used as a Section title in the side panel, Modular accordion header paired with icon, selections

Body2.comment: This is Body 2, a secondary size for paragraphs of text. This style is used in Legend, Snack bar, Search, Table rows, Side panel sub header (when stacked by XL)

Body2Medium.comment: This is Body 2, in medium weight. This style is used in Tags, Timeline, Search list item, Card ID and links

Body2Bold.comment: This is Body 2, in bold weight.This style is used in Banner, breadcrumbs ...

Body2BoldCaps.comment: This is Body 2, in bold weight.This style is used in Banner, breadcrumbs ...

Header2Medium.comment: Header 2, medium. Used in side panel header

Header2Bold.comment: Header 2, bold. Used in modal and header paired with sub title
